name: Alarms, Sirens and Horns
description:
Turn your device into a loud awesome Simulator for Air Horns, Stadium Sounds or Police Sirens! It is a portable Noise Maker with annoying sounds.

Features:

- Annoying loud sounds
- Play the sounds using a relevant sound image
- Air Horn
- Police Siren
- Fire Engine Alarms
- Air Raid
- Reggae Horn
- Boat Horns
- Truck Horns
- Car Alarms

Now make some Noise!
